item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.QCDMIXM Recovery update for Redmi 9A Global
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 9A Global

Codename: dandelion

Version: V12.0.3.0.QCDMIXM | 10.0

Size: 1.6 GB

MD5: 816d42afde556a8c7963f183d6c0d321

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to July 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
